trans-unit.source: A trigger action that stops a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
Use a StopStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively stop a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 使用与<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>或<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>以交互方式停止<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> StopStoryboard 操作

trans-unit.source: StopStoryboard only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: 仅影响 StopStoryboard<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>处于活动状态 (后<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>启动)。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Stopping a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: 停止情节提要触发器<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>事件，但不是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[如何︰ 使用事件触发器，以控制 a 情节提要后它将开始](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)有关示例。

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or StopStoryboard) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 暂停、 恢复、 停止或否则为控制情节提要以交互方式到可以暂停、 恢复或以其他方式控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>以交互方式，设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>属性其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>并用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>对象 (如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>，或 StopStoryboard) 来控制通过引用其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>未指定，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>开始后不能以交互方式对其进行控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[如何︰ 使用事件触发器，以控制 a 情节提要后它将开始](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard"></xref> class.
